::Orchestra/Composer::

    Orchestra listened to what Chameleon had to say=
.  Orchestra didn't need to tape record this, he had the best memory, for h=
is function.

     "I see.  And you say everybody calls you a coward?  Don'=
t worry about it....Nobody's a coward, sometimes they just aren't fit for f=
ighting," Orchestra said slowly, holding back a tear or two from thinking o=
f his brother Symphony, who never fought.  

       Orchestra turned back h=
is attention to Chameleon.  Orchestra got himself a drink of energin, sippe=
d, then continued talking.

      "Well, I must get going, gotta see Darkfa=
te," Orchestra said.

      Orchestra walked out of the room.  He turned of=
f the tape recorder.  Orchestra arrived to where Darkfate was.

      "Here=
's what I managed to get out of Chameleon," Orchestra said, handing the tap=
e recorder to Darkfate.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
      C=
omposer looked at Wheeljack.

      "Hey, I'm sure Zardus will allow us to =
go fight, besides, I would like to meet these Maximals," Composer said.
